title: 20 High-Quality Sale Items From Gap and Everlane to Style With Jeans
text: If freezing temperatures have you bundled up and realizing your winter wardrobe basics could use a bit of a boost, well, same. Luckily, two of our go-to retailers for high-quality basics at reasonable prices are having epic sales. How's that for perfect timing?Selected styles at Gap are 40% to 60% off. Meanwhile, Everlane's winter markdowns just went live, with many versatile pieces on sale for up to 70% off regular price. Even better? Both stores still have plenty of merchandise in stock in multiple sizes—no code needed.From tank tops to trunk coats, there are several deals (and some genuine steals) to be had right now at Gap and Everane. Keep scrolling to shop 20 of our favorite on-sale finds now so you'll be ready for whatever the rest of this winter weather has in store.Shop Gap's Sale Section Gap Oversized Boyfriend Sweater Your significant other will be begging to borrow this supremely comfortable sweater. Gap Mid Rise Baby Boot Jeans Short and petite folks swear by the baby bootcut. Gap Organic Cotton Poplin Classic Shirt If you're stocking up on basics, why not? Gap Modern T-Shirt Bodysuit In terms of quality, Gap's bodysuits are on par with the best brands. Gap Relaxed Balloon-Sleeve Sweater This cornflower blue sweater will brighten up even the snowiest day. Gap Vintage Soft Cropped Hoodie This hoodie is one of my favorite purchases from last year—the fit is perfect. Does anyone not need a black beanie right now? Gap High Rise Vintage Slim Jeans These are a steal and available in so many washes and sizes right now. Gap Cropped Duvet Wrap Puffer Jacket My puffer jacket has seen better days; at this price, I'm ready for a replacement. Gap GapFit Breathe T-Shirt Exercising in the cold is much more enjoyable in a breathable long-sleeve. Trust me. Shop Everlane's Sale Section Everlane The Topcoat in Wool We triple-checked the price on this camel coat, and all we can say is wow. Everlane The Midi Quilted Liner Treat this liner like another layer of insulation for all your winter outerwear. Everlane The Way-High Sailor Jeans Wear them with boots or flats. Everlane The Must-Have Shirt in Silky Cotton Everlane's classic button-down goes with everything—even sweatpants and Zoom calls. Get three tanks for less than the price of one! Everlane The Laid-Back Half-Zip Sweatshirt Everlane The Must-Have Shirt in Butterluxe Warm and cozy but still buttoned-up and polished. Everlane The Day Ballet Flats A leather ballet flat for under $50? Sold. Cropped puffer coat not cutting it this winter? Get a longer version for less than $100. Drew Elovitz is originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, but has spent the last decade living and working in New York City. She earned a master's degree in media and popular culture from New York University, then began her career on the internet as the Twitter voice of Barbie. She worked previously at Who What Wear as the director of content strategy and also spent several years leading the social media teams at Teen Vogue and Entertainment Weekly. You'll find her byline on the site around topics such as celebrity fashion, must-have basics, beauty favorites (particularly nail polish), and wellness tips and tricks. Her personal style tends to favor the classics: She loves crisp white button-downs, sneakers, and skinny jeans—and no look is complete without a great pair of oversize sunglasses and a trusty leather jacket. After she finishes reading the entire internet every day, she can be found dining out at her favorite restaurants, trying new beauty treatments, or indulging her historical-fiction habit.
html:
If freezing temperatures have you bundled up and realizing your winter wardrobe basics could use a bit of a boost, well, same. Luckily, two of our go-to retailers for high-quality basics at reasonable prices are having epic sales. How's that for perfect timing?

Selected styles at Gap are 40% to 60% off. Meanwhile, Everlane's winter markdowns just went live, with many versatile pieces on sale for up to 70% off regular price. Even better? Both stores still have plenty of merchandise in stock in multiple sizes—no code needed.

From tank tops to trunk coats, there are several deals (and some genuine steals) to be had right now at Gap and Everane. Keep scrolling to shop 20 of our favorite on-sale finds now so you'll be ready for whatever the rest of this winter weather has in store.

Shop Gap's Sale Section

Gap

Oversized Boyfriend Sweater

Your significant other will be begging to borrow this supremely comfortable sweater.

Gap

Mid Rise Baby Boot Jeans

Short and petite folks swear by the baby bootcut.

Gap

Organic Cotton Poplin Classic Shirt

If you're stocking up on basics, why not?

Gap

Modern T-Shirt Bodysuit

In terms of quality, Gap's bodysuits are on par with the best brands.

Gap

Relaxed Balloon-Sleeve Sweater

This cornflower blue sweater will brighten up even the snowiest day.

Gap

Vintage Soft Cropped Hoodie

This hoodie is one of my favorite purchases from last year—the fit is perfect.

Does anyone not need a black beanie right now?

Gap

High Rise Vintage Slim Jeans

These are a steal and available in so many washes and sizes right now.

Gap

Cropped Duvet Wrap Puffer Jacket

My puffer jacket has seen better days; at this price, I'm ready for a replacement.

Gap

GapFit Breathe T-Shirt

Exercising in the cold is much more enjoyable in a breathable long-sleeve. Trust me.

Shop Everlane's Sale Section

Everlane

The Topcoat in Wool

We triple-checked the price on this camel coat, and all we can say is wow.

Everlane

The Midi Quilted Liner

Treat this liner like another layer of insulation for all your winter outerwear.

Everlane

The Way-High Sailor Jeans

Wear them with boots or flats.

Everlane

The Must-Have Shirt in Silky Cotton

Everlane's classic button-down goes with everything—even sweatpants and Zoom calls.

Get three tanks for less than the price of one!

Everlane

The Laid-Back Half-Zip Sweatshirt

Everlane

The Must-Have Shirt in Butterluxe

Warm and cozy but still buttoned-up and polished.

Everlane

The Day Ballet Flats

A leather ballet flat for under $50? Sold.

Cropped puffer coat not cutting it this winter? Get a longer version for less than $100.

Drew Elovitz is originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, but has spent the last decade living and working in New York City. She earned a master's degree in media and popular culture from New York University, then began her career on the internet as the Twitter voice of Barbie. She worked previously at Who What Wear as the director of content strategy and also spent several years leading the social media teams at Teen Vogue and Entertainment Weekly. You'll find her byline on the site around topics such as celebrity fashion, must-have basics, beauty favorites (particularly nail polish), and wellness tips and tricks. Her personal style tends to favor the classics: She loves crisp white button-downs, sneakers, and skinny jeans—and no look is complete without a great pair of oversize sunglasses and a trusty leather jacket. After she finishes reading the entire internet every day, she can be found dining out at her favorite restaurants, trying new beauty treatments, or indulging her historical-fiction habit.
